mapper.select: SELECT DECODE( (SELECT MEM_ID FROM member WHERE mem_id=#{mem_id}) ,#{mem_id} ,'_ok' ,'false') FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (mem_id,mem_name,mem_bdate,mem_gender,mem_jdate ,mem_email,mem_address,mem_nickname,mem_password,mem_phone) VALUES (#{mem_id}, #{mem_name}, #{yyyy}||'/'||#{mm}||'/'||#{dd}, #{mem_gender} ,(SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'||'/'||'MM'||'/'||'DD') FROM DUAL) ,#{mem_email}, #{zipcode}||' '||#{address}||' '||#{address_detail}, #{mem_nickname}, #{mem_password}, #{mem_phone})
